body.title: TERMINAL AND GATE

body.text:
Gates 19-25

  • Fly By Checkin

body.title: TICKET COUNTER HOURS
body.text:
Monday-Saturday

Airport opens 90 minutes before first departure

Sunday

Airport opens 150 minutes before first departure

body.title: TSA
body.heading: Check current TSA wait times
body.text: Don't forget your boarding pass or security documents, and a valid government-issued ID - the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) will need them at the security checkpoints.

body.title: AIRPORT DETAILS
body.text:
Service Animal Relief Area: Located north of American Airlines' ticketing lobby

Learn more about Mineta San Jose International Airport
